The date icon keeps disappearing from the top.  I have to open the apps again in order to find it back.  It keeps on like this.  Please check & handle or I would want a refund.
I love this app because it's easy to use, it doesn't drain your battery life and no ads in pro version! It's worth the price....less than $2.00.....seriously great app
I'm greatful that Google let's you refund or if be furious!

Date at upper left is easy to read, compact, works well with a variety of displays. Battery level a nice plus but could use option to remove it when it duplicates a present status bar indicator. Drop-down menu functions but has room for improvement. Please provide option to show information top-down (2015 Apr 25 Sat) as well as bottom-up (Sat 25 Apr 2015). No need for commas in either date form. Please eliminate clutter: 'Week 3, Day 18' is perfect, no need for 'Week no:03==day no:18'. Thanks!
App fails to start the program and then you have to manually start it. Having to do this every day is extremely irritating!
Brought the pro version and loved it under Kitkat.  Since my upgrade to Lollipop, leaving it on drains my battery in about 1 hour.
Keeps disappearing,have to keep activating, pain in butt.

Been using this for 1 year plus now, and now since the date on the left side have been fixed, no more disappearance... I gonna raise my previous 3 star to 4 ★★★★... and I really hope the Dev would add more colours. You will get a 5 from me once more colors are added.

Have had no problems with the app; however, for what you pay for, you should at least get more options in color like red not red/green for the date. Also, anything else for the status bar would be great. I mean, you get what you advertised ---not more. If you just want to change the date color on the status bar with a few limited colors, this apps for you. The developers are not doing anything more or new to this app. DULL!

I like it. I think it should be  slightly wider and bigger - example Sat 19 Jul .especially in the pro version - needs more editing to our size and taste . Which I sure future updates will sort out. Thank you.
Goes away after a few minutes
Keeps displaying yesterday's day/date. Have to hide, then show to get the right date on my Nexus 5. This ought to be fixed on a paid App  Of course, no response from the developer.
1.29 $ for four extra colors? ?
This app should be standard on all Google phones! Way to go!

Pro version is worth it for the extra color options. Have long sought an app to add the DAY of the week in the status bar and pull-down menu for the Droid X (Android 2.3.4) and this is the best ad-free version found. It's when one is using app that cover the screen, often on calls, text messages, browsing, etc. that I need to know the day of the week. -- Stock status bar press only shows Month, Date, Year. But whoever designed that should of *also* included the Day as an option. -- This app satisfies that missing information when using full screen apps.

content: I have a Galaxy 2. I paid for the app so it would automatically show. It failed. I must manually install everytime. Waisted money.
replyContent:
Hi Johnny
As we stated in your previous review for this features to work the app needs to be installed on the phones memory and Not the sd  card. This is a bug on Android and not our app. The app was recently tested and works fine on auto start. If you need to discuss this further email us on wagwanapps@gmail.com

Thanks

content: I have a galaxy 2. I bought the full version so It would load on start. I does not load aaarrrgh!
replyContent:
Hi Johnny

This is because the app is installed on the SD card and not the phone. Because the phone initializes the SD card at the end of the start up process sd card  apps that need to start up miss the call from the phone to start. This is a well known bug on some android devices.

Thanks
Wagwan Apps
